sources.title: Lethal Justice | Full Movie | Steven Seagal Action | True Justice Series
sources.description:
Elijah Kane (Steven Seagal) and his team are up against a new wave of criminals, a society of people trying to organize and revitalize the ways of segregation; a group who call themselves, the “New Hope.”
2010.  Stars: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind, William 'Big Sleeps' Stewart, Meghan Ory, Warren Christie

metadata.Plot: The local cops in the city of Edmond have their own method of dealing with criminals: they make sure that justice is served at the scene of the crime.
metadata.Actors: Larry Williams, Jodi Russell, Kenneth McCabe
